data.text:
Parry Restaurant Group Parry Restaurant Group Charles City, VA Charles City, VA Part-time Full-time Part-time Full-time $25 - $30 an hour $25 - $30 an hour Ready to embark on a wine-filled adventure? Join our team as Tasting Room Staff at Upper Shirley Vineyards and immerse yourself in the world of fine wines at our picturesque vineyard! Previous experience is not required.

If you have a taste for hospitality and enjoy the hustle and bustle of a fast-paced work environment, we'd love to hear from you! Apply today on our website:

uppershirley.
